p:
Six compounds were selected by the NCI, according to NCI’s DTP selection guidelines
57 , for evaluation of their anticancer activity at a single-dose of 10 µM against 60 human tumours cell lines. The compounds’ screening findings are summarised in Table 1. Data analysis resulting from the primary assay showed that chalcone derivatives Vd, Ve, and Vf showed moderate to good inhibitory activity mainly against leukaemia and colon cancer cell lines.
